headline: McKinsey Sees a ‘Great Convergence’ as Public and Private Markets Blur
summary: Asset managers reported rising revenue and stubbornly sticky profit margins in 2024, but their business looks likely to change in the year ahead as alternative investing goes mainstream.

raw.headline: McKinsey Sees a ‘Great Convergence’ as Public and Private Markets Blur
raw.summary: Asset managers reported rising revenue and stubbornly sticky profit margins in 2024, but their business looks likely to change in the year ahead as alternative investing goes mainstream.

headline: Trump Offshore Wind Halt Overturned. Orsted Stock Jumps.
summary: A federal judge agreed to allow Danish energy company  Orsted  to resume construction on an offshore wind project near Rhode Island, imposing a preliminary injunction on the Trump administration’s decision to halt the project.  The decision sent Orsted’s American depositary receipts up 9.1% in midday trading on Monday.  Revolution Wind said it will resume impacted construction work as soon as possible, with safety as the top priority.

headline: Strive Buys Bitcoin Hoarder Semler as Treasury Wave Shows Cracks
summary: The combined company will hold nearly 11,000 Bitcoin, according to a statement Monday.  Digital-asset treasury companies have sprung up around the world in recent months as cryptocurrency prices rose, adopting the balance-sheet strategy pioneered by Michael Saylor’s Strategy Inc. Strive’s deal for Semler appears to be among the first between publicly traded crypto hoarders, and it comes a week after Strive turned itself into a Bitcoin proxy.

headline: AgriFORCE Growing Systems (AGRI) to Launch as First Publicly-Traded Avalanche-Focused Company on NASDAQ with a $550 Million Capital Raise Strategy
summary: AgriFORCE Growing Systems Ltd. (Nasdaq: AGRI) today announced it will be renamed AVAX One (the "Company") and plans to raise approximately $550 million, establishing the first NASDAQ-listed company with a dedicated strategy to maximize ownership of AVAX, the native token of the Avalanche network.
